name: FindTextureFileNameFromCRC
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.DL R1 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Find an existing custom skin or simple object texture file. The model files are located in models server folder by default (artpath setting).

params_body.name: crc
params_body.description: The CRC checksum of custom model file.

params_body.name: retstr[]
params_body.description: An array into which to store the .txd file name, passed by reference.

params_body.name: retstr_size
params_body.description: The length of the string that should be stored.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute.
related_fn: OnPlayerFinishedDownloading: Called when a player finishes downloading custom models.
related_cb: OnPlayerFinishedDownloading: Called when a player finishes downloading custom models.
